title: NetBeans 6.1 Beta is out!
body: NetBeans 6.1 is out, along with a contest. There's a lot to like about it, but my personal favorite is the MySQL support. It couldn't have come at a better time: just a couple of days ago I started a big-ish project using MySQL, and the new NB features have really helped. And if you haven't tried the Visual Web Designer yet, take it out for a spin.
